word:
15-20 (John 4:13, 14). A Fountain of Living Water.--The condition of many of those who claim to be the children of God 
                                                                           964
is exactly represented by the message to the Laodicean church. There is opened before those who serve God, truths of inestimable value, which, brought into the practical life, show the difference between those who serve God and those who serve Him not.
